Desordre.query_sql: INSERT INTO Desordre (id_objet, groupedesordre, cote, catdes, geom, typedes, position) VALUES (?,'INF',?,?,st_geomfromtext(?,2154),?,?)

Equipement.query_sql: INSERT INTO Equipement (id_descriptionsystem, id_objet, cote, geom, position, typeequipement) VALUES (?,?,?,st_geomfromtext(?,2154),?,?)

Infralineaire.query_sql: INSERT INTO Infralineaire (id_descriptionsystem, id_objet, geom) VALUES (?,?,st_geomfromtext(?,2154))

Objet.query_sql: INSERT INTO Objet (datemodification, datecreation, libelle) VALUES (?,?,?)

Observation.query_sql: INSERT INTO Observation (id_objet, dateobservation, commentaires, gravite, nombre) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)

Misc.Select_using_geom: SELECT {table_name01}.id_{table_name01} FROM {table_name01}, {table_name02} WHERE {table_name01}.id_{table_name01} = {id_search} ORDER BY ST_Distance(ST_MakeValid({table_name01}.geom), ST_MakeValid({table_name02}.geom)) ASC LIMIT 1
